title: Issue Here
body:
Hey! i've got a problem with the client, once i finish with champ select the actual game's ..... laucher? startup? idk how it's called (the place where the game actually starts and loads the game) does not even open and it get's me back to reconect screen, once i click reconect again the acual laucher closes and opens again saying reconect again, sorry fot the truble hope you can help me fix it :)


i've tryed it and it does not even open the practice tool and also i played like a week ago just fine so it's not the pc.

replies.body: Sounds like your network is having a really hard time getting connected to the game servers specifically. Let's do some basic network troubleshooting to first make sure everything is configured properly using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
